name: Anton Featured Events Manager
author: Anthony Carbon

sections.description:
Anton Featured Events Manager allow select an event you wish to be featured on your front-end page sections. Featured an event can be done via edit event page or via events dashboard list page. Enjoy using this plugin.

Main Features

  • Featured an event via edit event page.
  • Featured an event via events list dashboard page.
  • Widgets available in widgets dashboard page.
  • Shortcode available in every widgets created. That means you can use your widgets via shortcode everywhere.
  • Build-in developer’s friendly widget settings.
  • Available layout options.
  • Templates can be override in your current theme. Check our documentation in Anton Featured Events Manager documentation.

Addons

Anton Featured Events Manager Layout 1 – download here

Anton Featured Events Manager Layout 2 – download here

Anton Featured Events Manager demo

Happy coding everyone ðŸ˜€
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Dashboard > Events menu in your dashboard page.
sections.faq:
Why do we have to use this plugin

Because it is cool.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Lets see what’s missing on this plugin for the help of you.

short_description: Anton Featured Events Manager is an addons of Events Manager created By Marcus Sykes.
